name: AQUALIS (アクアリス) English Ver.
description:
Aqualis (アクアリス in Japanese) is the unofficial American remake of the critically acclaimed 2D shooter. 

IMPORTANT: Some fe̷͔̒̐atures have been modified, excluded, and forgotten in this remake. One important feature that has been forgotten is the inclusion of tutorial messages. To move, use WASD. To boost, use LEFT SHIFT. To shoot, use SPACE.

As a sub-aquatic spy, you must fight your way through waves of Quid Limers, pirate submariners that have laid claim to the waters below. Infiltrate their base and blow it up! Don't worry about any this game is not what it seemsand most importantly, have fun!

If you wanna follow my other projects, then follow me on Twitter @GrapePaste.
